version_description:
• Adapt to iOS 9
• Adapt Swift 5 to reduce app size
• Long press for moving position in both edited and non-edited states
• Fix bugs where initial speed may show negative or large values

• Perfect fit for iOS 12.4.1
• Fixed bug that failed to launch some apps

• Adapt to iOS 13 and dark mode
• Fix bug where Wi-Fi name could not be obtained on iOS 13:
iOS 13 or higher system needs to allow access to the location in order to obtain the Wi-Fi name. AWidget obtains location information only to obtain the Wi-Fi name and does not upload location information.This feature is off by default.
